domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@realDonaldTrump Dude in the last day you've tweeted 56 times (tweets, not retweets) but only one that offers condolences to the victims of coronavirus or tries to make the country feel better.

First 56 tweets in a day is a lot, like a lot a lot, and two you should care more.
